description._content: Image taken from: Title: "History of Clear Creek and Boulder Valleys, Colorado. Containing a brief history of the State of Colorado [by W. B. Vickers] ... a history of Gilpin, Clear Creek, Boulder and Jefferson Counties [respectively by J. Burrell, A. Frost, A. Bixby and E. L. Berthoud] and biographical sketches" Shelfmark: "British Library HMNTS 10409.l.13." Page: 18 Place of Publishing: Chicago Date of Publishing: 1880 Publisher: O. L. Baskin & Co. Issuance: monographic Identifier: 000719958 Note: The colours, contrast and appearance of these illustrations are unlikely to be true to life. They are derived from scanned images that have been enhanced for machine interpretation and have been altered from their originals.
